response.overview: Filmed November 7, 2006 at the historic Olympia Theater at the Gusman Center in Miami, Florida, Heavenly Voices spotlights the soaring vocal artistry of Ryland Angel, Giorgia Fumanti, and Sasha & Shawna- four exceptional singers whose musical abilities and training set them apart from their contemporaries- in a remarkable recital of intimate songs accompanied by the Tim Janis Ensemble. While they differ stylistically and vocally from each other, these virtuosi share a singular trait- the warmth and operatic intensity they bring to their individual interpretations.  The impact of the live show is heightened by sumptuous film production and striking visuals framing each performance, filmed in locales native to each artist, from the hills of Tuscany to the valleys of Wales to autumn in New England.
response.title: Heavenly Voices
